آرسنل نے 1993 میں ایف اے کپ جیتا۔: Arsenal FA Cup win 1993 Arsenal 1993 FA Cup victory

The 1993 FA Cup final was contested by Arsenal and Sheffield Wednesday at Wembley. The original match, played on 15 May 1993, finished 1–1. Arsenal won the replay on 20 May, 2–1 after extra-time. The final and the replay were held at Wembley Stadium.
Arsenal FA Cup win 1993 Arsenal 1993 FA Cup victory

It was won by Arsenal, who beat Sheffield Wednesday 2–1 in the replay after a 1–1 draw in the final at the old Wembley Stadium. The goals were scored by Ian Wright and Andy Linighan, who scored in the 119th minute. This was the last FA Cup final to be decided by a replay before final replays were abolished in 1999.
